Identify.oai:repositoryName: UC Irvine, Special Collections and Archives: Orange County Manuscript Maps

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Manuscript map of lands bordering Rancho Niguel

mods:mods.mods:note: Signed "R. Egan, December 11th 1878 (date of contract) … Feb. 26th 1879 (when surveyed)." Contains holograph note "Rec'd and filed in the U.S. Land Office Los Angeles Cal. March 29 1879."
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Manuscript map of lands east of Aliso Creek

mods:mods.mods:note: Survey of lands east of Aliso Creek bordering Rancho Cañada de los Alisos, Rancho Trabuco, and Rancho Mission Viejo, undated; includes topographical details
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Manuscript map of Mission San Juan Capistrano

mods:mods.mods:note: Plat map depicting town plaza and perimeter, including mission church and courtyard, adobe walls, some roads, orchards, vineyards, and cemetery
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Manuscript map of lands around San Juan Capistrano

mods:mods.mods:note: Survey of lands around San Juan Capistrano, between boundaries of Rancho Niguel and Rancho Boca de la Playa, undated. Includes topographical features and roads both in the non-rancho lands being surveyed and in the eastern section of Rancho Boca de la Playa
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Manuscript map of Rancho San Joaquin

mods:mods.mods:note: Extends from the Balboa Peninsula (labeled "Sand Spit") to Laguna Beach (labeled "Long Beach") along the western edge of the map. Extends from a geographic feature labeled "Red Hill" and the Santa Ana River along the northern edge of the map. The map's southern edge is marked by public lands and Rancho Cañada de Los Alisos. Some topographical features
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Material in public domain. No restrictions on use
